pages.title: Lord of Torment
pages.text: Undisputed rules of the $(l:dimensions/torment)Torment$(/l) dimension, this mighty demon is able to create prisons to Torment its victims.$(br)Once summoned, the demon will start flying and shooting fireballs that can inflict $(item)Slowness$()$(br)When half of its health is depleted, it will teleport itself and the fighting players to the $(item)Torment$(). There, it will sit in the center waiting for the player to come to it. Once reached, the fight resumes.

pages.title: Summoning the Lord
pages.text: The $(item)Lord of Torment$() can be summoned by a Ritual outlined in a $(l:resources/torment_contract)Torment Scroll$(/l).

pages.title: Rewards
pages.text: Fighting the $(item)Lord of Torment$() might be the only way to obtain the necessary knowledge to banish other creatures to the prisons created by the demon in the Torment, using $(symbology/introduction)Symbol Magic$(/l).
